"If I had a base of operations I wouldn't be looking for temporary 
research facilities." Lady Hawk didn't dare lead them back to her 
father there was no telling what type of damage these bots would do 
with his research. "Well do I stay or go?" She saw opportunity 
lurking in DevilDuers eyes they both could see the opportunity she 
represented, "I have work to start, do I work with your group or find 
another facility?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer nods, his mind going over what Lady Hawk said.
> 
> "Sounds good," he finally says, "Do you have a base of operations?"
